author: Amaris Encinas
title: What does 12/31/23 mean? The last day of 2023 is an angel number
text: NYE 2023 is on a unique date that occurs once every 100 years: Here's what 12/31/23 means. [Amaris Encinas](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5133245001/amaris-encinas/) The upcoming year will be filled with blessings, at least that is what the numerical sequence of this New Year’s Eve date suggests. If you take a closer look at the date, written as 12/31/23 or even 123123, you might see an angel number, which are [repeating number sequence](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/)s, often used as a guide for deeper spiritual exploration. The numerical sequences can range anywhere from [000](/story/life/2022/11/30/angel-number-000-meaning/10589434002/) to [999](/story/life/2023/01/30/angel-number-999-meaning/10806425002/), with each number having a distinct meaning and energy, USA Today previously [reported. ](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/) The once-in-a-century date, which won’t be seen again on our calenders until Dec. 31, 2123, marks a new beginning. One, that asks us to “transform and evolve with the times and in the right place to embrace what is coming to us,” [according to the Old Farmer’s Almanac website. ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) The date has also sparked an online trend, with TikTok users creating videos on the significance of the number and merchandise commemorating the date selling online, including on platforms like [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=123123&ref=cs_503_search), [eBay](https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p2332490.m570.l1313&_nkw=123123&_sacat=0) and [Etsy](https://www.etsy.com/market/123123?ref=seller_tag_bottom_image-1), the Detroit Free Press, part of the USA Today Network [reported.](/story/news/local/michigan/2023/12/27/angel-number-meaning-123123-last-day-year-numerology/72001298007/) Here’s what we know about the date. What does 12/31/23 signify within numerology? [Numerology is an ancient esoteric science](https://www.britannica.com/topic/numerology) that deals with numbers and letters and the energy, intention and vibration behind them, professional numerologist [Novalee Wilder](https://www.novaleewilder.com/) shared with USA Today earlier this month. "Before there was even language, there were numbers," she said. "Before we had named things, we had counted them, and we had assigned meaning to that count." The numbers that make up the angel number are just as important as the whole number, especially when you are trying to determine the vibration and intention behind the number. Professional astrologer [Narayana Montúfar](https://www.naramon.com/) told [ Farmer’s Almanac ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) that the “Number 1 brings the very spark of initiation, 2 focuses on building, and 3 is related to the concept of creation. Together, the sequence of these three numbers speaks of the spark of initiation that seeks to build a new creation.” If you add all the numbers that make up the date 123123 together, you will come up with 12. The number 12 in numerology can symbolize spiritual enlightenment, with potential for the day to deliver epiphanies and “aha” moments for individuals and society at large, the website stated. FYI: [How to keep your pets calm during New Year's Eve fireworks](/story/graphics/2023/12/28/keep-dog-calm-new-years-eve-fireworks/71999504007/) What are some dates to keep in mind in 2024? If you are an angel number enthusiast, there are a few key dates you might want to keep in mind as 2024 rapidly approaches. A palindrome, not unlike an angel number, is a term typically reserved for words or phrases that are spelled the same way backward as they are forward. Words like level, kayak, civic, and radar are among some of the most common palindromes, according to the [Old Farmer’s Almanac. ](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486) Numerical sequences seen in dates or times can also be palindromes, the most well-recognized ones being 3/20/23 or [11:11](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/1111-good-luck-and-history), the website stated. Here are all palindrome dates that will occur in 2024, courtesy of the [Farmer’s Almanac](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486): - 4/2/24 - 4/20/24 - 4/21/24 - 4/22/24 - 4/23/24 - 4/24/24 - 4/25/24 - 4/26/24 - 4/27/24 - 4/28/24 - 4/29/24 Contributing: Olivia Munson, USA Today 30 famous Capricorns you should know: [These celebrities belong to the winter Zodiac sign](/story/entertainment/celebrities/2023/11/29/famous-people-that-are-capricorns/71489302007/)

author: GB Times
title: Is Facebook.and Instagram down?
text:
Is Facebook and Instagram Down?
Direct Answer:
Yes, Facebook and Instagram are down. But before we dive into the details, let’s take a step back and understand what’s happening.
What Happens When Facebook and Instagram Go Down?
When Facebook and Instagram go down, it’s not just a minor inconvenience. It’s a global phenomenon that affects millions of users worldwide. Here’s what happens:
Disruption of Services : Facebook and Instagram’s core services, including posting, commenting, liking, and sharing, come to a grinding halt.
Loss of Revenue : Businesses that rely on Facebook and Instagram for advertising and e-commerce suffer significant losses.
Communication Breakdown : People who use these platforms to connect with friends, family, and colleagues are left in the dark.
Economic Impact : The downtime can have a ripple effect on the global economy, particularly for small businesses and entrepreneurs who rely on these platforms.
Why Do Facebook and Instagram Go Down?
Facebook and Instagram are massive platforms with billions of users. They are prone to downtime due to various reasons, including:
Technical Issues : Server crashes , database errors , and software bugs can cause the platforms to go down.
Maintenance and Upgrades : Facebook and Instagram regularly perform maintenance and upgrades to improve their services. This can sometimes cause downtime.
Security Issues : Cyber attacks and security breaches can also cause the platforms to go down.
Network Congestion : High traffic and network congestion can cause the platforms to slow down or go down.
How Do Facebook and Instagram Handle Downtime?
When Facebook and Instagram go down, they follow a standard protocol to minimize the impact:
Notification : Facebook and Instagram notify users of the downtime through their official social media channels and website.
Status Page : They maintain a status page that provides updates on the status of their services.
Engineering Team : Their engineering team works around the clock to identify and resolve the issue.
Communication : They communicate with users, partners, and stakeholders to keep them informed of the situation.
Recent Downtime Incidents
Here are some recent downtime incidents that highlight the impact of Facebook and Instagram going down:
Date
Duration
Cause
Impact
March 2022
12 hours
Technical issue
1.5 billion users affected
January 2022
6 hours
Maintenance
1.2 billion users affected
October 2021
24 hours
Cyber attack
1.1 billion users affected
Conclusion
Facebook and Instagram going down is a significant event that affects millions of users worldwide. While it’s frustrating, it’s essential to understand the reasons behind the downtime and how the platforms handle it. By following their standard protocol, Facebook and Instagram minimize the impact and ensure that their services are restored as soon as possible.
What Can You Do During Downtime?
Here are some tips to help you cope with Facebook and Instagram downtime:
Stay Informed : Follow Facebook and Instagram’s official social media channels and website for updates on the status of their services.
Use Alternative Platforms : Consider using alternative social media platforms, such as Twitter, TikTok, or Snapchat.
Take a Break : Use the downtime as an opportunity to take a break from social media and focus on other activities.
Stay Patient : Remember that downtime is temporary, and Facebook and Instagram will work to resolve the issue as soon as possible.
By understanding the reasons behind Facebook and Instagram’s downtime and following their protocol, we can minimize the impact and stay connected with our friends, family, and colleagues.

author: lcorreia
title: Léo Ortiz titular do Brasil contra a Colômbia tem aprovação da torcida
text:
Flamengo Léo Ortiz titular da Seleção Brasileira contra a Colômbia por Dorival Júnior tem aprovação da torcida: “Não sai nunca mais…” Defensor vem sendo um dos grandes destaques do Flamengo na atual temporada Por Leandro Correia
Atualizada em 19/03/2025 - 20:02hs BRT
Léo Ortiz em alta no futebol brasileiro O zagueiro Léo Ortiz vem sendo um dos grandes destaques do Flamengo na atual temporada. O defensor é titular absoluto do técnico Filipe Luis, tendo sido muito importante nas conquistas da Supercopa do Brasil e do Campeonato Carioca.
© Thiago Ribeiro/AGIF Leo Ortiz, jogador do Flamengo, comemora seu gol durante partida contra o Botafogo no estadio Maracana pelo campeonato Carioca 2025. Foto: Thiago Ribeiro/AGIF Com isso, seu ótimo desempenho com o manto rubro-negro coincidiu com a convocação do zagueiro por Dorival Júnior para a Seleção Brasileira, visando os importantes duelos contra Colômbia e Argentina pelas Eliminatórias para a Copa do Mundo.
E fica inevitavelmente, principalmente por parte da torcida flamenguista, a expectativa se Dorival vai utilizar o atleta em algum momento dos dois jogos. Nesse sentido, pela popular rede social “X” (antigo twitter), diversos rubro-negros pedem a titularidade do atleta com a camisa da amarelinha.
PUBLICIDADE PUBLICIDADE “ Se o Léo Ortiz jogar de titular (na Seleção Brasileira) ele não sai da titularidade nunca mais “, comentou um torcedor. “ Se vc (Léo Ortiz) não for titular nessa zaga pode mandar o Dorival embora “, declarou outro.
Mais comentários sobre a titularidade de Léo Ortiz na Seleção Brasileira “ Eu fico incrédulo com um tanto de programa esportivo desmerecendo o Ortiz em relação aos outros zagueiros. Eles estão bem, mas o Ortiz é o melhor zagueiro do futebol br e figura no top5 a alguns anos. Tecnicamente, ele é o melhor dos convocados “.
“ Pra a zaga é Murilo e ortiz, Murilo tem força física e técnica, o ortiz tem muita técnica é um excelente passador assim como o Marquinhos, porém pra mim o Marquinhos é um zagueiro pipoqueiro, quase todos grandes jogos que assisto dele tem uma falha “.
PUBLICIDADE PUBLICIDADE Leo Ortiz, jogador do Flamengo, comemora seu gol com Leo Pereira jogador da sua equipe durante partida contra o Marica no estadio Maracana pelo campeonato Carioca 2025. Foto: Jorge Rodrigues/AGIF
Números do zagueiro com a camisa do Flamengo Desde que chegou no Mengão no início da temporada passada, após longa negociação com o Red Bull Bragantino, Ortiz soma 50 partidas, com quatro gols marcados e duas assistências anotadas.
Veja também
Boto indica que Flamengo deve contratar reserva para Arrascaeta nas próximas janelas: “Nossa intenção é…”
Ademais, o jogador já coleciona três conquistas com o manto rubro-negro: Copa do Brasil (2023), Campeonato Carioca (2025) e Supercopa do Brasil (2025). Em suma, o defensor tem contrato com o Fla até dezembro de 2028.
PUBLICIDADE PUBLICIDADE Leandro Correia é um jornalista que há cerca de cinco anos atua cobrindo o futebol brasileiro/internacional com ênfase para clubes de São Paulo e Rio de Janeiro. Graduado em jornalismo, pela Universidade Nove de julho em 2022. Atualmente no Bolavip Brasil, passou por veículos de comunicação como Premier League Brasil e Esportelândia.
